definition.text: All Datasets of any type of bot within the Superalgos system are considered products of the Bot that produced them. Why products? Because users will be able to sell hese datasets in the form of subscriptions once the Superalgos Network is implemented.

paragraphs.text: In the future, users will be able to offer products to the rest of the users of the Superalgos Network / Superalgos Marketplace. A single bot might produce as many products as the bot designer wishes. Each product might contain one or more datasets.
